tool.name: quotas
tool.command:
parsec quotas create_quota --name "$name" --description "$description" --amount "$amount" --operation "$operation"
#if $default --default "$default" #end if #if $in_users --in_users "$in_users" #end if #if $in_groups --in_groups "$in_groups" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: name
input.label: name
input.help: Name for the new quota. This must be unique within a Galaxy instance.

input.name: default
input.help: Whether or not this is a default quota. Valid values are ``no``, ``unregistered``, ``registered``. None is equivalent to ``no``.

input.name: in_users
input.help: A list of user IDs or user emails.

input.name: in_groups
input.help: A list of group IDs or names.
